name: attache
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who works in an embassy and has a particular area of responsibility in which they have special knowledge: a naval/military/press/cultural attaché

Add to word list
a person who works in an embassy (= group of people representing their country in a foreign country) and has a particular area of special knowledge and responsibility: a military attaché
